website_summaries.verdict: A high-fashion, leather BareTrap knee-high boot with a trio of wound leather straps and buckle design.
pros: Fashionable-yet-comfortable boot features slouchy shaft featuring hidden wedge heel
Adds extra height without visible heels
Synthetic sole for better grip in range of surfaces

customer_reviews.title: I went with a 7 1/2 and it fits perfect, and it doesn't make my foot look huge
customer_reviews.text: This boot runs small, I usually wear a 6 1/2 or 7 . I went with a 7 1/2 and it fits perfect, and it doesn't make my foot look huge. It is a petite looking boot. I don't know why the sizing of BareTraps changed but they did. I have a former pair in a 6 1/2 which they were the perfect fit. The next year I ordered a brown and black in that 6 1/2 way to small , gave them to my daughter in law which she wears a 5 and they fit her perfect. So you really need to go at least a 1/2 size larger to be happy with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: I am usually about a 5.5 in shoes but get a 6 in boots for extra support. These run a bit small for sure. About a half size I'd say. I was also pretty surprised the foot bed was pretty hard given the brand. The material was oddly shiny as well. The style is nice but I'm not keeping them due to the material.
customer_reviews.author: LabrynthTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!!
customer_reviews.text: These not only look great, but are extremely comfortable. I am a teacher and I’m on my feet all day. My feet feel better in these boots than most shoes. I highly recommend them. They are also very durable.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy! I love this brand. Very soft inner lining. The foot bed is a bit hard, so I’d recommend getting a half size up and adding some memory foam insoles. They are a bit shiny, but that doesn’t bother me. I have somewhat skinny calves, and they fit my legs really well and are not too gappy at the top, which is nice because typically I have trouble finding boots that are not too gappy at the top. So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Anna J Shafran

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too tight on my calfs.
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for my calls. Nice boots though and heel height is perfect for everyday wear, but too tight around my calfs and cut off my circulation. They will be going back.
customer_reviews.author: FIGHTING MBC

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots literally fell apart after about 6 months, but I was given a full refund from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soooo comfortable and the wedge is nice height but not too much... my goto brand for boots!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfect the lining inside is nice very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots. The do run a little small so if you have wider feet, I'd recommend you buy a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Maderic

customer_reviews.title: Fits great and I love the stretch around the
customer_reviews.text: Cute! Fits great and I love the stretch around the calves
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. A little bit larger on the size but otherwise excellent boots!
customer_reviews.author: Repentandbelieve

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: So excited to get to wear these all the time! BareTraps makes excellent boots, superior quality!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Brewer

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and the lining feels great against my bare legs
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and the lining feels great against my bare legs. I've also gotten several compliments on their appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great boots, stylish and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just received these boots and they are so cute! Very comfortable and stylish, very happy with the purchase. I ordered the mushroom color which is a brownish grey, very versatile. I'm very happy with these and really like the baretraps brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Muir

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Fit somewhat small and the style just wasn't right. However the return was seamless so I appreciated that.
customer_reviews.author: Nevan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was too small and it isnt as pretty as i thought it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Yushi

customer_reviews.title: Good for skinny calves. Pretty comfy!
customer_reviews.text: First I just bought these from Shoe Carnival for $53. They were clearance there. I am normally a size 8 or 8.5 but the 8.5 in these boots was too small in the toe area and the size 9 fit great! They are not uncomfortable though I wonder how they will feel after I've worn them for several hours. Also I really like how they fit around my calves/legs. I hate how most boot I see are wide width or wide calf. I do not have wide calves. So if you are like me then these are not skin tight but fit pretty good with skinny jeans on.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

product_meta.title: BareTraps Women's Bt Qacha Slouch Boot
product_meta.description: Women's tall shaft boot with decorative straps and hidden wedge outsole.
feature_bullets: Knee-high boot with slouchy shaft featuring hidden wedge heel and trio of straps with oval buckles
